Original:
二訪。

不吵，室內禁煙，調酒有自己的風格與節奏，不會有太多限制的放鬆好地方，經典調酒很好喝，創意推薦也很棒。

今天帶另外一半來，還帶了一個不常跑酒吧的朋友來，都感到很舒服放鬆。音樂都很chill

自己很喜歡，有別於現在很多喧鬧的小酒館，適合想放鬆、品嚐調酒的客群。

聽說威士忌的選擇很多，但我看不太懂...我只認識阿貝和...四朵玫瑰、日本的威士忌、還有...還有什麼協會酒？

今天大家喝了Daiquiri、white lady、威士忌sour、某系列的阿貝、自家調製梅酒、柚子酒、還有其它說不出來的酒...感覺都很棒，老闆會照我的喝酒節奏倒水、聊天，也不會像其它間酒吧一樣催你點單，慢慢喝，很開心。

朋友喜歡泥煤味的威士忌，喝的很開心，但我覺得...很...特別...

炸薯條也好吃，老闆說如果有其它想吃的可以叫外送（只要味道不要像榴槤）
很棒的地方~

缺點...我忘了問wifi密碼...連不上去，跟我之前去的時候密碼不一樣，然後好像只有老闆一個人，他服務很好，但有點忙
EN:
Second visit.

No noise, no smoking in indoor, bartending has its own style and rhythm, there will be no restrictions to relax, the classic bartending is delicious, and creative recommendations are great.

Bring the other half today, and I also brought a friend who did not run often, and I felt very comfortable and relaxed.The music is very chill

I like it very much. It is different from many noisy taverns, which is suitable for customers who want to relax and taste bartender.

I heard that there are a lot of whiskey choices, but I don't know very much ... I only know Abei ... Four roses, Japanese whiskey, and ... what other association wines?

Today, everyone drank Daiquiri, White Lady, whiskey sour, Abe in a series, my own preparation of plum wine, grapefruit wine, and other wine that could not be said ... It felt great, the boss would pour the water in my drinking rhythm. , Chat, I won't urge you to order like other bars, drink slowly, and happy.

Friends like mud -flavored whiskey and drink very happy, but I think ... very ... especially ...

French fries are also delicious. The boss said that if there are other people who want to eat, you can call it out (as long as the taste is not like durian)
A great place ~

Disadvantages ... I forgot to ask the WiFi password ... I can't even go up, the password is different from when I went before, and then it seemed that there was only the boss alone.

Original:
北中南去過的酒吧有幾十家，沒有遇過服務態度這麼差的!
當天是唱完歌續攤，到店是最後一組客人，因為是無酒單，每個人各點一杯經點調酒；最後一個點的是當天的壽星，由於他點的調酒Vesper有兩種做法，所以問了店家是採用哪一種，店家回:”你不用管我怎麼做，你只要管你喝不喝的完就好了”。由於朋友比較有在喝調酒，所以又說了，"不是啦，你就跟我說你會用哪種做法就好"，店家一樣回:"你不用管我怎麼做，我做了你喝完就對了"，口氣之差，不知道是不是在模仿他附近的個性酒吧.....但人家有名氣且不會讓人那麼感到不舒服或者被針對!!  喔對了，當天我們從那間個性酒吧外帶了2袋長島冰茶過來(因為他們準備打烊了只能外帶)，店家一開始說可以在裡面用，後來又說不能在他們店裡飲用別家的酒，實在是…喔，還有，我們在這間店也點了兩杯長島冰茶，只能說個性久吧得比較好喝而且還便宜一百元，看前面留言的人也有被氣到的，奉勸各位小心
EN:
There are dozens of bars I have been to north, Zhongnan, and have not encountered such poor service attitude!
On the same day, it was the last group of guests after singing the song, because there was no wine list, and everyone ordered a cup of menstrual bartender each. The practice, so I asked which one was used, and the store returned: "You don't have to care about what I do, you just need to ignore you."Since my friends are more drinking and bartender, I said again, "No, you tell me what kind of approach you will use", the store returns: "You don't need to care about what I do, I did you drink It's right ", the tone is bad, I don’t know if I am imitating his personalized bar near him ... but people are famous and will not make people feel so uncomfortable or targeted !! Bring 2 bags of long island ice tea from that personality bar (because they are ready to snooze and can only take it). The shopkeeper said at the beginning that it could be used inside, and later said that they could not drink other wines in their stores. … Oh, and we also ordered two cups of Long Island ice tea in this shop. We can only say that the personality is more delicious and 100 yuan cheaper. careful
